heartbeat.en: Take your time. Which service do you need?
heartbeat.nl: Neemt u gerust de tijd. Met welke dienst kan ik u helpen?
heartbeat.tr: Acele etmeyin. Hangi hizmete ihtiyacınız var?

greeting.en: Hi, this is Voxeron. Which service do you need?
greeting.nl: Hoi, u spreekt met Voxeron. Met welke dienst kan ik u helpen?
greeting.tr: Merhaba, Voxeron'a hoş geldiniz. Hangi hizmete ihtiyacınız var?
